thread.title: Mom who works
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Mom who works

author: Mom who works
title: Mom who works
text: I am busy and really never read how to maximize my Fabletics VIP membership; unfortunately I lost membership rewards because of that. However, I sat down today since I had time and better understand the company, how it works -- - and now we are members in FabKids. Thanks for a great way to shop and keep current with casual wear!
